#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;
int a[100005];
int s[100005];
int s1;
int bsearch(int,int,int);
int main()
{
    int n,i,b,c,d;
    scanf("%d",&n);

    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    scanf("%d",&a[i]);
    s1=0;
    s[s1]=a[0];

    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        b=bsearch(a[i],0,s1);
        if(b==0)
        {
            s1++;
            s[s1]=a[i];
        }
    }
    //for(i=0;i<=s1;i++)
    //printf("%d ",s[i]);
    printf("%d\n",s1+1);

    return 0;
}
int bsearch(int val,int first,int last)
{
    int mid;
    while(first<=last)
    {
        mid=(first+last)/2;
        if(((s[mid]>val)&&(mid==first))||((s[mid]>val)&&(s[mid-1]<=val)))
        {
            s[mid]=val;
            return 1;
        }
        if((s[mid]==val))
        {
            if(mid+1<=s1)
            {
                s[mid+1]=val;
                return 1;
            }
            else
            {
                s1++;
            s[s1]=val;
            return 1;
            
            }
        }
        if(s[mid]<val)
        {
            first=mid+1;
        }
        else
        last=mid-1;
    }
    return 0;
}
